title: Italy's falling consumer morale adds to worries
text:
Italy's falling consumer morale adds to worries 4:07pm BST - 01:43
Morale among Italian consumers dropped to its lowest in nine months in May amid the country's long post-vote political stalemate, while in Germany wages rose by 2.5 percent and supporting expectations that the consumer will continue to drive growth in Europe's largest economy. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
